nodes.text: The Inventory Droid Assistant (I.D.A.) was a repair droid owned by the Star Tours company during the Galactic Civil War. Despite being an unintelligent machine, it seemed to have a mind of its own and a definite aversion to heavy work. The I.D.A. was operated by the worker droid R2-D7, who used it to bring replacement parts from inventory to the Droidnostics Center of Tomorrowland Starport, though it had a hard time getting the stubborn repair droid to work.
The background for this droid comes from a "Spot the Droid" poster displayed at the Tokyo Disneyland Star Tours, which was translated at the EndorExpress.net fan site.
